articles.title: McDonald's blames global outage on third party - BBC.com
articles.description: Company says the worldwide issue happened during a 'configuration change' but was not cyber-related.

articles.title: Former Trump official Steve Mnuchin puts forward plan to buy TikTok app - Al Jazeera English

articles.content:
Former United States Treasury Secretary Steve Mnuchin has announced plans to rally investors in the hopes of buying the popular video-sharing app TikTok.
